api_list.name: Get the news in swahili
api_list.description: This request will return the news articles in swahili language
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kenyan-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/swahili"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kenyan-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all the news in english
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about climate change from all over the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kenyan-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/English"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kenyan-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
